t: Violent Waves by Circa Survive (2012) Audio CD - Amazon.com Music
s: Having just returned from The Sounds of Animals Fighting show in Philly I decided to buy Circa Survive's latest album to keep the Anthony Green kick going. It's not my first Circa album, as I own the first two, but I took a break from them as I tend to flip flop between my tastes and Anthony Green.

t: CIRCA SURVIVE - Violent Waves - Amazon.com Music
s: It is the first album to be record ... allows Circa to take some musical and emotional liberties in expressing what they feel and not what will sell. t: Circa Survive - The Amulet - Amazon.com Music
s: This is easily an excellent Circa Survive CD and can tie easily with their best previous CDs. It has a very cohesive vibe throughout the venture and is a complete piece of art.

t: Circa Survive - Two Dreams - Amazon.com Music
s: Updated: Slowly connecting Circa dots with cohesive melodies and subtle intricacies that ebb and flow with emotive embers that burn brighter with repeated listens. Seems ever artist has that one CD that can cause sleep enducing daydreams if given the right mindset.

t: CIRCA SURVIVE - Blue Sky Noise - Amazon.com Music
s: I'd recommend this cd to people who enjoy singers who drive their sound from deep within, music listeners who appreciate intricately layered music (ie. the bass part is pretty involved), alternative music fans looking for a new band, and of course any fans of Circa Survive or Anthony Green.

t: Appendage - Amazon.com Music
s: I've been a music nut my whole life, and own about 400 physical albums, which I've picked very carefully over two decades. I feel very safe in saying that Circa Survive is in my small group of bands that are not only groundbreaking, but timeless at the same time.
